text:
="preserve">Jonathan Louis Oppenheim (November 10, 1952 – July 16, 2020) was an American movie and television editor and producer. His works were mainly documentaries. Oppenheim was known for his work on "The Oath" (2010) and "Paris Is Burning" (1990). He was born in New York City.
Oppenheim died on July 16, 2020 from brain cancer, aged 67.
